AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan associated with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR., rented from Hertz Rental Car Company at the Laredo International Airport, and registered to a location other than where it was rented
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck involved in a traffic stop on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hertz Rental Car Company: Rental car company with locations throughout the United States, including the Laredo International Airport
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo International Airport: Location where RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s white Malibu sedan was rented from Hertz Rental Car Company
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.SANTIAGO HINOJOSA: Manager with the Hertz Rental Car Company at the Laredo International Airport, who testified about the company's rental policies
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who stopped RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s white Malibu sedan and testified about his knowledge of rental car companies
